name: Blizzard Flask
effects: Hybrid ice damage (4x, ATK & MAG) to all enemies
Inflict Stop (30%) for 3 turns on all enemies

name: Blizzard Flask

desc_long: Ice damage and stop all enemies
對全體敵人發動冰屬性攻擊並施加停止效果。

Verursacht Eisschaden und stoppt alle Gegner.
